item.title: A phishing email scam involving PayPal and Norton is ripping of unsuspecting Australians
item.description: Unsuspecting Aussies have been warned about a new phishing scam that appears to be a legitimate email from payment platform PayPal. Those targeted receive a fake payment receipt via email, purported to be sent by PayPal, for a subscription to Norton 360 Deluxe costing $360.98. The receipt includes a phone number to call should the recipient believe the charges are incorrect. A note on the receipt reads: ‚ÄúIf you don‚Äôt authorised this charges you have 24hrs, to cancel and get an Instant refund of your annual subscription by contacting our customer support team +61 2 8091 5185‚Äù.

item.title: Can a landlord go through my personal belongings?
item.description: Spread the love              Answer Landlords are not permitted to enter your apartment and go through your items at their leisure. item.title: Do palmetto bugs live in palm trees?
item.description: Answer Because they reside in or at the base of palmetto trees in tropical and subtropical regions, such as the cabbage palm (Sabal palmetto), which is hardy in USDA plant hardiness zones 8 through 10, cockroaches are known as palmetto bugs. Cockroaches are also known as palmetto bugs. Do palm trees, on the other hand, attract roaches? Cockroaches are often connected with palm leaves and plants in that location, so it makes sense that they would be there.

item.title: What is the difference between muscle spasm and spasticity?
item.description: Spasticity is a symptom of multiple sclerosis that causes your muscles to feel stiff, heavy and difficult to move. A spasm is a sudden stiffening of a muscle which may cause a limb to kick out or jerk towards your body. How do you treat spasticity and spasms? Management and Treatment Performing stretching exercises daily. Prolonged stretching can make muscles longer, helping to decrease spasticity and prevent contracture.Splinting, casting, and bracing.

item.title: What is the real color of milk?
item.description: Milk is naturally a white substance due to the make-up of water and other components including fat and protein that mix together to form tiny particles which reflect light. What is the exact colour of cow milk? Cow milk varies from white to creamy white, slightly yellow, depending on the breed and the feed. Cows that are eating fresh green pasturage, or rich green hay or silage, or a fodder, produce milk that is yellowish.

item.title: How did Roman toilets work?
item.description: The Romans cleaned their behinds with sea sponges attached to a stick, and the gutter supplied clean flowing water to dip the sponges in. This soft, gentle tool was called a tersorium, which literally meant ‚Äúa wiping thing.‚Äù The Romans liked to move their bowels in comfort. How did the Roman sewer system work? The Romans had a complex system of sewers covered by stones, much like modern sewers. Waste flushed from the latrines flowed through a central channel into the main sewage system and thence into a nearby river or stream.

item.title: How do I know if I have tight hip flexors?

What is a bike with 5 wheels called?
item.description: A pentacycle, ("hen and chickens" ), is a human-powered five-wheeled vehicle. What is a farthing bike? A high wheel bicycle (also known as a penny farthing, high wheeler and ordinary) is a type of bicycle with a large front wheel and a much smaller rear wheel that was popular in the 1880s. The first Penny farthing was invented in 1871 by British engineer, James Starley. Why is it called Boneshaker? First made in France during the 1860s by the Michaex Company, boneshakers were so named because they had solid tyres and were extremely uncomfortable to ride.

item.title: What is the difference between dogwood and cherry blossom?
item.description: Answer The blossoms on the cherry tree and the pink dogwood are what distinguish them from one another. The pink dogwood features larger blossoms, which are often four petals in number. The pink dogwood features larger blossoms, which are often four petals in number. While the cherry blooms are smaller and have more petals on them than the pink dogwood, the cherry blossoms are considerably more delicate.

item.title: How often should insulation be replaced?
item.description: Unless damaged, it can last 80 to 100 years in most houses before it needs to be replaced. However, insulation can start falling from fiberglass batts after 15 to 20 years, so if your insulation was installed in batts well over a decade ago, it might be time for an inspection or a home energy audit. Is it worth replacing old insulation? Fiberglass insulation typically needs to be replaced 15-20 years into it's life, as it can easily become dirty, wet, moldy, and ineffective if there's a roof leak or water damage of any kind.

How do Uber drivers get promoted?
item.description: How are driver promotions determined? Driver promotions vary based on market factors, such as forecasted rider demand and driver availability. Uber usually offers opportunities to earn extra to limit anticipated market imbalance, such as during rush hour. Do Uber drivers get different promotions? In other words, Uber offers promotions if they are anticipating a spike in order demand or a drop in driver supply. It makes sense that Uber uses promotions to incentivize drivers to get on the road, but nobody knows why two drivers in the same city or same area get different promotions.

item.title: Why are store bought eggs brown?
item.description: The different eggshell colors come from pigments the hens produce. The main pigment in brown eggshells is called protoporphyrin IX. It's made from heme, the compound that gives blood its red color ( 4 ). Are brown eggs just dyed? No, brown eggs are not dyed! This one comes down to some basic science. The egg shell is composed mainly of calcium carbonate, which is white. If the hen lays brown eggs, the natural pigments of the brown egg are added to the shell in the last hours of shell formation.

Java is the programming language in which RuneScape's game engine is mostly written though it should not be confused with RuneScript, the scripting language that Jagex uses to create new content for RuneScape.

item.description: Romance filmsReviewAmandla Stenberg plays a biracial teenager who falls for a young German officer in Amma Asante‚Äôs uncomfortable second world war drama There‚Äôs a heartfelt impetus behind Amma Asante‚Äôs new film, a period drama set in Nazi Germany with an interracial theme at its heart. The film gives us elements of melodrama and also of epic ‚Äì yet there is also something a little uncomfortable about it. Asante‚Äôs original screenplay is inspired by the historical case of what were crudely called Rheinlandbastarde, mixed-race people in Nazi Germany who had been fathered by military personnel of African background in the Occupied Rhineland after the first world war.

item.title: Why are my shoes dry rotting in my closet?
item.description: Dry rot is the process in which leather degrades due to the lack of moisture in the material. When all the oil from the leather evaporates, the fibers in the material become brittle and crack, which leads to permanent damage. This process usually occurs if your leather footwear is kept in warm, dry conditions. Can dry rot shoes be repaired? Cracking and Flaking (Red Rot and Dry Rot)Unfortunately, once the leather is cracked, there is no way to repair those areas and fix the broken fibers.

item.title: Why do people hang dice from their rearview mirror?
item.description: Answer It‚Äôs possible that World War II pilots were the ones who started the tradition. After the World War II pilots came home, the habit of carrying dice for good luck was transformed into the practise of hanging them from your vehicle‚Äôs rearview mirror, and the fuzzy dice connotation remained as a symbol of good luck over the years. Aside from this, why do people hang fuzzy dice on trees?

item.title: Will Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 Have Zombies?
item.description: Wondering whether Zombie mode is coming to Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2, and if so, what other game modes will accompany it at launch? Read our guide to find out.
